Name: WWII Tanks: Forgotten Battles
About the game: WWII Tanks: Forgotten Battles Choose your side USA/Great Britain, Axis or USSR! Participate in the biggest historical tank battles of World War II! Go through the entire war on different tanks, feel the horror of war on your skin! Game Features: Beautiful graphics Realistic tanks of the WWII Historical maps and battles Possibility to choose tanks Game mode: Single Missions Three Campaigns (USA/UK, AXIS and URSS) Wide selection of famous WWII tanks: Germany: Tiger 1 Panzer-IV Sdkfz251 MÃ¶rser Karl USSR: T-34/76 T-34/85 KV-I KV-II BT-7 T-35 Japan: Type 89 Finland: BT-42 United Kingdom: Cromwell Sherman Firefly and many more.
